p: The Lipinski’s rules as well as the level of human intestinal absorption, AMES carcinoma, acute oral toxicity in human has been found within the limit according to this rule. Hereafter, kanjone; lanceolatin – B; milletenone; ovalitenone; and pongamol meet the requirement of Lipinski’s five rules which might be measured as drug-likeliness and are represented in Table 7 .
